title: Coleen Rooney denies TV return in fierce message
text:
You won’t be seeing Coleen Rooney on Strictly any time soon (Picture: WireImage)

Coleen Rooney has denied her TV return in a fierce message after it was rumoured she was eyeing up Strictly Come Dancing 2020.

The 33-year-old told her Instagram followers that she has been making up fake stories in order to catch out who has been selling her news to the press.

Sharing a heated rant onto her social media, the WAG claimed to have set up a plot to expose the culprit, which she claims is Rebekah Vardy.

Coleen wrote: ‘Over the past five months I have posted a series of false stories if they made their way into the Sun newspaper.

‘And you know what, they did! The story about gender selection in Mexico, the story about returning to TV and then the latest story about the basement flooding in my new house.’

She added: ‘It’s been tough keeping it to myself and not making any comment at all, especially when the stories have been leaked, however I had to.

‘Now I know for certain which account/individual it’s come from.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I have saved and screenshotted all the original stories which clearly show just one person has viewed them. It’s…… Rebekah Vardy’s account.’

However, her fellow footballer’s wife has since denied the accusations.

The spat comes after insiders claimed that the mother-of-four is wanting to enter the showbiz world once again.

She denied the TV return in a fierce message (Picture: Getty)

The star previously had her own show, Coleen’s Real Women (Picture: WireImage)

When chatting to Heat magazine, a source said: ‘She’s hired a new team and is already hard at work on a massive rebrand.

‘She wants to step back into the spotlight and remind the public that she’s not just Wayne’s wife or a mum to four boys.’

They added: ‘The family is really excited to see her follow her dreams, and her parents have already said they will help with the kids.’

On top of this, the source went onto say that Coleen is also eyeing up a spot on next year’s Strictly Come Dancing.

They said that there are talks about her fronting her own makeover show, a chat show, and a home renovation series, so watch this space.

She’s currently living in Cheshire with her family after moving back from the US (Picture: Instagram)

The star shares Kai, nine, Klay, six, Kit, three, and one-year-old Cass with her husband Wayne Rooney.

Just recently the family moved back to Cheshire after the footballer was signed to Derby County as their player-coach.

Advertisement

Advertisement

But despite the move, their relationship has been tested after claims that the father-of-four cheated on his wife after being linked to a woman in a hotel.

He has furiously denied the speculation, calling the mystery women nothing but a mere fan.

The sportsman, 33, tweeted: ‘Nothing happened between me and any girl on that night in Vancouver. I did not enter the lift alone with the girl pictured in the hotel foyer.

‘The girl pictured in the club was simply one of many who innocently asked for autographs and pictures.’

Metro.co.uk have reached out to Coleen’s reps for further comment.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: You won't be seeing Coleen Rooney on Strictly any time soon as she denies TV return in fierce message.
